name: neonexus/ionicons-bundle
description: Easy integration of Ionicons into Symfony2 projects (based on similar package by Coding Fogey).

suggest.twbs/bootstrap: Sleek, intuitive, and powerful mobile first front-end framework for faster and easier web development.
